definitions.definition: A more specific term ; a subordinate grouping word or phrase; a term designating a subclass of another more general class described by the given word.
examples: The words “dog”, “cat”, and “horse” are hyponyms of “animal” because dogs, cats, and horses are types of animal.

main_definition: ( semantics ) A more specific term ; a subordinate grouping word or phrase; a term designating a subclass of another more general class described by the given word.
